text: The gripper moves downward, positioning itself above an orange block on a wooden surface. The gripper then closes around the block, securing it firmly. As the gripper lifts, the block rises along with it, indicating that the block is being held by the gripper. The camera angle shifts slightly, revealing more of the surrounding area, including a laptop and some cables on the left side of the frame. The block remains securely held by the gripper throughout the sequence.
